summary: This document is a secure message from TD Ameritrade regarding a transfer request made by Jeffrey Epstein. It confirms the receipt of the transfer request and outlines the next steps in the processing of the request. The message includes contact information for further inquiries.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual who submitted a transfer request to TD Ameritrade.

persons.name: David Redlinger
persons.context: David Redlinger is the representative from TD Ameritrade who communicated with Epstein regarding the transfer request.

persons.name: Chad
persons.context: Chad is mentioned in the context of the account transfer request but lacks further details.

connections.description: David Redlinger is providing services to Jeffrey Epstein regarding his account transfer request.

events.title: Transfer Request Submission
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein submitted a transfer request to TD Ameritrade for processing.

keyFacts: The document is a secure message from TD Ameritrade regarding a transfer request.
Jeffrey Epstein is the client who submitted the transfer request.
David Redlinger is the representative from TD Ameritrade who communicated with Epstein.
The transfer request involves an external transfer to Deutsche Bank.
The document includes contact information for further inquiries regarding the transfer.
